sdata.j: この↑店↑↓みせ↓は|↑地↑↓ち↓の↑利|↑↓り↓をえている。
sdata.e: This store enjoys a geographical advantage.

sdata.j: あそこの↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓はうまいし↑値段↑↓ねだん↓も↑安↑↓やす↓いが、|↑地↑↓ち↓の↑利|↑↓り↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いのが↑難点↑↓なんてん↓だね。
sdata.e: That place's food is great, and their prices are good, but the fly in the ointment is their terrible location.

sdata.j: ↑天↑↓てん↓の↑時↑↓とき↓は|↑地↑↓ち↓の↑利|↑↓り↓に↑如↑↓し↓かず、|↑地↑↓ち↓の↑利|↑↓り↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑和↑↓わ↓に↑如↑↓し↓かず。
sdata.e: Opportunities of time vouchsafed by Heaven are not equal to advantages of situation afforded by the Earth, and advantages of situation afforded by the Earth are not equal to the union arising from the accord of Men.

sdata.j: あそこの↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓はうまいし↑値段↑↓ねだん↓も↑安↑↓やす↓いが、|↑地↑↓ち↓の↑利|↑↓り↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いのが↑難点↑↓なんてん↓だね。
sdata.e: That place's food is delicious and their prices are low. However, their location isn't good.
